Enemies of Note

customize.name: Gleaming Charge: Frostnight Scion
customize.desc:
An elegant elemental life form that possesses immense elemental affinity. The long years have exposed it to high concentrations of Electro, resulting in its present form.
One of the manifestations with the most violent temperament, it commands steel-shattering bolts of lightning like mere servants, such that any land it passes through shall be marked as if by a marauding, thunderous calamity.
In still-extant prayers of the far north, it was born from the Frost Moon's blessings, symbolizing the pure source and the first radiance. Perhaps this is why it finds the tainting of its pale purity with the seven colors of heavenly light unbearable, thus rejecting all life that draws too close.

Kuuhenki 1 (bottom one on the player's map) is on the ground
Kuuhenki 2 (middle one on player's map) is not on the ground (above the player’s head in image 2). Jump on blue Unipolar Fields nearby in Empowered State to get to the Kuuhenki.

Quest Objective: Retrieve the fragment from the Moon Mirror
This is a puzzle. The numbers on the images help understand the order in which the mirrors should be approached. The last image shows the result
Use the Kuuvahki on the red hook to pull it.
Use the Kuuvahki on the blue hook to move it left.
Use the Kuuvahki on the red hook to pull it toward the player (standing on the left)
Use the Kuuvahki on the floor the statue is on to pull it toward the player.

Quest Objective: Throw the fragment(s) at the stone
Grab each fragment from a statue and throw it at the orbiting stones on the left.
Only one fragment can be held at a time, so grab one, throw it, then grab another.
The grabbing and throwing actions are done using the Kuuvahki.
